DOCNAME: CASE OF SINEX D.O.O. v. MONTENEGRO
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Administrative proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time);Violation of Article 13 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant is a privately owned company which was established in DATE and registered in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant and Beranka AD , a sociallyowned company , concluded a guarantee agreement . To secure the payment of obligations under this agreement , the applicant and ORG concluded ORG . CARDINAL on the fiduciary transfer of the latter ’s property to the applicant ( ORG br . CARDINAL ORG o fiducijarnom prenosu prava svojine ) . In this FAC , the property offered as collateral was : ( a ) property no . DATE storehouse ( magacin ) ; ( b ) property no . DATE power plant ( energana ) ; ( c ) property no . DATE boiler - room ( kotlovnica ) ; ( d ) property no . DATE laboratory ( laboratorija ) ; and ( e ) property PMCARDINAL – paper machines ( papir mašine ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the fiduciary transfer of ORG property to the applicant was registered by ORG in Berane ( Direkcija za nekretnine , Područna jedinica LOC
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG in PERSON ( NORP sud u ORG ) opened insolvency proceedings in respect of Beranka AD .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant reported its claim in these proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG refused to recognise this claim .

CARDINAL . Following the decision of DATE , on DATE the insolvency administrator for GPE AD ( stečajni upravnik ) lodged a request with ORG in Berane seeking that the registration of the fiduciary transfer of property to the applicant be erased . On DATE ORG accepted this request .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged an appeal with ORG in Berane ( Uprava za nekretnine Područna jedinica Berane ) . On DATE ORG amended the said decision .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG in GPE ( Uprava za nekrentine u GPE ) quashed both decisions on appeal and remitted the case for reconsideration .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG in Berane re - registered the fiduciary transfer on properties nos . CARDINAL and DATE , as well as on PMCARDINAL , but refused to re - register the fiduciary transfer on properties nos . CARDINAL and CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG in GPE upheld this decision .
CARDINAL . The applicant appealed to ORG . On DATE the ORG quashed the decision of ORG in GPE and remitted case to ORG in Berane . It would appear that the case is still pending before that body .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG issued an enforcement decision ordering the registration of the applicant ’s fiduciary rights in respect of all properties .

CARDINAL . Following ORG decision of CARDINAL DATE ( see paragraph CARDINAL above ) , the applicant lodged an objection . The hearings concerning the objection were held on DATE , CARDINAL DATE and DATE . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s objection .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG in Berane again erased the fiduciary transfer of ORG property from the public register . On DATE the applicant lodged an appeal against this decision .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the decision of ORG to erase the applicant ’s fiduciary rights .
CARDINAL . On DATE , upon an appeal by the applicant , ORG quashed the decision of the ORG and remitted the case to ORG in Berane for reconsideration .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG in Berane ordered the removal of the applicant ’s rights on DATE property from the public register .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed the decision of DATE and remitted case to the first instance .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG in Berane stayed the proceedings , because it needed some documents which were in the file of a case pending before ORG . This decision was quashed by decision of ORG and the matter was remitted to the first instance .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG adopted a decision allowing the deletion of the applicant ’s rights from the public register . The same authority confirmed that decision on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed an objection with ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant also lodged an appeal with ORG . On DATE ORG rendered a decision in the applicant ’s favour and ordered ORG to reconsider on the applicant ’s prior objection .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG remitted the case to the first instance . The proceedings are still pending before ORG in Berane .
